title: Tourist Resort Sharm el Sheikh Turns Into COP27 Climate Summit Host
description: The Red Sea resort hosting the U.N. climate summit has played a role in international diplomacy, but also suffered tragedy.
dc:creator: Vivian Yee
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: An Egyptian police officer at the entrance to the Sharm el Sheikh International Convention Centre during the COP27 climate summit opening on Sunday.
